price: Isaan beekumsi kennameef, inni Rabbii kee irraa gara keetti buufame inni dhugaa ta’uu nibeeku. gara karaa (Rabbii) injifataa, faarfamaa ta’eetti qajeelcha.
arabic: وَيَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيَهۡدِيٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wayarā alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma alladhī unzila ilayka min rabbika huwa al-ḥaqa wayahdī ilā ṣirāṭi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
